info.title: kinomic database
info.description: The API for the database for the kinomic toolbox (http://toolbox.kinomecore.com)

get.description: returns the tiff image that matches the given image file name (img_file_name).
returns all data for in the name collection that matches either {doc_id} or the query

parameters.name: doc_id
parameters.description: If one document is needed, and the id known, fill this in.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: max number of records to return https://mongodb.github.io/node-mongodb-native/markdown-docs/queries.html#query-options

parameters.name: maxTimeMS
parameters.description: max amount of time to wait for query return https://mongodb.github.io/node-mongodb-native/driver-articles/anintroductionto1_4_and_2_6.html#maxtimems

200.description: Some number of name data objects

get.description: returns all data for a given {level} that matches either {doc_id} or the query

parameters.name: doc_id
parameters.description: If one document is needed, and the id known, fill this in.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: max number of records to return https://mongodb.github.io/node-mongodb-native/markdown-docs/queries.html#query-options

parameters.name: maxTimeMS
parameters.description: max amount of time to wait for query return https://mongodb.github.io/node-mongodb-native/driver-articles/anintroductionto1_4_and_2_6.html#maxtimems

200.description: Some number of level 1 data objects

get.description: returns all data for a given {level} that matches either {doc_id} or the query

parameters.name: doc_id
parameters.description: If one document is needed, and the id known, fill this in.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: max number of records to return https://mongodb.github.io/node-mongodb-native/markdown-docs/queries.html#query-options

parameters.name: maxTimeMS
parameters.description: max amount of time to wait for query return https://mongodb.github.io/node-mongodb-native/driver-articles/anintroductionto1_4_and_2_6.html#maxtimems

200.description: Some number of level 2 data objects

_id.description: uuid generated to be identical for each level

run_data.description: meta data array for run data, should be generate by every run

value.description: If entry is same for every image taken then it is a single string. Otherwise it is an array of strings.

origin.description: only occurs if signal file and background file generate different values for a given key.

_id.description: uuid generated to be identical for each level

run_data.description: meta data array for run data, should be generate by every run

value.description: If entry is same for every image taken then it is a single string. Otherwise it is an array of strings.

origin.description: only occurs if signal file and background file generate different values for a given key.

exposures.description: All exposures that were utilited to create kinetic models, typically just 50ms.

equation_string.description: 'eval'-able string to resolve the equation object used to generate the parameterization.

background.description: background values for each image series

R2.description: R2 of the corresponding kinetic model

WW.description: Wald-Wolfowitz p-value for the randomness of the residuals (higher = more random)

signal.description: background values for each image series

R2.description: R2 of the corresponding kinetic model

WW.description: Wald-Wolfowitz p-value for the randomness of the residuals (higher = more random)

cycles.description: All cycle numbers that were utilited to create linear models, typically just post-wash.

background.description: background values for each image series

R2.description: R2 of the corresponding kinetic model

signal.description: background values for each image series

R2.description: R2 of the corresponding kinetic model

_id.description: uuid generated to be identical for each level

run_data.description: meta data array for run data, should be generate by every run

value.description: If entry is same for every image taken then it is a single string and is kept. Otherwise it does not transfer to level 2.

origin.description: only occurs if signal file and background file generate different values for a given key.
